The size also very good thing, butt then there is no the advisor or wondet movies. :( Luckily i can download the full version from here: http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/3838674/Civilization_II_Multiplayer_Gold_Edition :) This torrent is good if you want to get the game fast or when you computer is full, 700 Mib is pretty much.
Great game, thanks for it! Like the scenarios too.
